summary: A documentary in which Freda Kelly looks back at her career as lifelong secretary for The Beatles.
cast: Freda Kelly|John Lennon|Paul McCartney|Ringo Starr|George Harrison|Angie McCartney|Billy Kinsley|Tony Barrow|Pete Best|Billy Hatton|Rachel Norris|Elsie Starkey|Joey Bower|Linda McCartney|June Underwood|Niall Norris|Jane Asher|The Beatles|Cynthia Lennon|Maureen Starkey
title: Good Ol' Freda
